articles.author: RAMATOULIE JAWO, MONIKA PRONCZUK
articles.title: Gambia upholds its ban on female genital cutting. Reversing it would have been a global first - The Associated Press
articles.description: Lawmakers in the West African nation of Gambia have rejected a bill that would have overturned a ban on female genital cutting. The attempt to become the first country in the world to reverse such a ban had been closely followed by activists abroad. The vote …
articles.content: BANJUL, Gambia (AP) Lawmakers in the West African nation of Gambia on Monday rejected a bill that would have overturned a ban on female genital cutting. The attempt to become the first country in the… [+4705 chars]
